title: If I do not have a report, can I come in?
body: Riot or any other pbe player, if I do not have any reports in my account, can I log in being level 10,13,12,14?

replies.body: I don't believe you have to be level 30 because there might also be testing periods for the leveling up experience.  I don't have any information, though, beyond what's provided in our[ PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  Best of luck with your application!
